mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sl_bs_account ( SL_ACCOUNT, SL_TEL, SL_SHOW_NAME, SL_CONTACT, ACCOUNT_PSD, ACCOUNT_IMG, AUTH_STATUS, FROM_FLG, CRT_TIME, CRT_ID, DEL_FLG,
UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME,
VER ) VALUES ( #{slAccount}, #{slTel}, #{slShowName}, #{slContact}, #{accountPsd}, #{accountImg}, #{authStatus}, #{fromFlg}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId},
'0',
#{updId}, #{updTime}, #{actId}, #{actTime},
0
)

INSERT INTO sl_bs_basic_info ( SL_CODE, SL_ACCOUNT, SL_CODE_DIS, SL_CON_FLG, AREA_CODE, LGCS_AREA_CODE, PROVINCE_CODE, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_CODE, CITY_NAME, DISTRICT_CODE, DISTRICT_NAME, EP_ID, SL_MAIN_CLASS, SNK_FLG, SELF_FLG, AGENT_FLG, OEM_FLG, BUYER_FLG, SQA_STATUS, DIST_QUA, SHOP_QUA, MEMO1, MEMO2, MEMO3, MEMO4, MEMO5, MEMO6, MEMO7, MEMO8, MEMO9, MEMO10, MEMO11, MEMO12, MEMO13, MEMO14, MEMO15, MEMO16, MEMO17, MEMO18, MEMO19, MEMO20, DEL_FLG, CRT_TIME, CRT_ID,
UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME,
VER ) VALUES ( #{slCode}, #{slAccount}, #{slCodeDis}, #{slConFlg}, #{areaCode}, #{lgcsAreaCode}, #{provinceCode}, #{provinceName}, #{cityCode}, #{cityName}, #{districtCode}, #{districtName}, #{epId}, #{slMainClass}, #{snkFlg}, #{selfFlg}, #{agentFlg}, #{oemFlg}, #{buyerFlg}, #{sqaStatus}, #{distQua}, #{shopQua}, #{memo1}, #{memo2}, #{memo3}, #{memo4}, #{memo5}, #{memo6}, #{memo7}, #{memo8}, #{memo9}, #{memo10}, #{memo11}, #{memo12}, #{memo13}, #{memo14}, #{memo15}, #{memo16}, #{memo17}, #{memo18}, #{memo19}, #{memo20},
'0',
#{crtTime}, #{crtId},
#{updId}, #{updTime}, #{actId}, #{actTime},
0
)

INSERT INTO sl_bs_buyershop ( SL_CODE, SL_IDCARD, SL_SORT, SL_ADDRESS, LAT, LON, FLAG10, FLAG9, FLAG8, FLAG7, FLAG6, FLAG5, FLAG4, FLAG3, FLAG2, FLAG1, CRT_TIME, CRT_ID,
UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME,
VER,
DEL_FLG
) VALUES ( #{slCode}, #{slIdcard}, #{slSort}, #{slAddress}, #{lat}, #{lon}, #{flag10}, #{flag9}, #{flag8}, #{flag7}, #{flag6}, #{flag5}, #{flag4}, #{flag3}, #{flag2}, #{flag1}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId},
#{updId}, #{updTime}, #{actId}, #{actTime},
0,
0
)

INSERT INTO sl_bs_shop_info ( SL_CODE, SHOP_ID, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_LOGO, MANAGING_CHARACT10, MANAGING_CHARACT9, MANAGING_CHARACT8, MANAGING_CHARACT7, MANAGING_CHARACT6, MANAGING_CHARACT5, MANAGING_CHARACT4, MANAGING_CHARACT3, MANAGING_CHARACT2, MANAGING_CHARACT1, SHOP_FLAG30, SHOP_FLAG29, SHOP_FLAG28, SHOP_FLAG27, SHOP_FLAG26, SHOP_FLAG25, SHOP_FLAG24, SHOP_FLAG23, SHOP_FLAG22, SHOP_FLAG21, SHOP_FLAG20, SHOP_FLAG19, SHOP_FLAG18, SHOP_FLAG17, SHOP_FLAG16, SHOP_FLAG15, SHOP_FLAG14, SHOP_FLAG13, SHOP_FLAG12, SHOP_FLAG11, SHOP_FLAG10, SHOP_FLAG9, SHOP_FLAG8, SHOP_FLAG7, SHOP_FLAG6, SHOP_FLAG5, SHOP_FLAG4, SHOP_FLAG3, SHOP_FLAG2, SHOP_FLAG1, CRT_TIME, CRT_ID,
UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME,
VER,
DEL_FLG
)VALUES( #{slCode}, #{shopId}, #{shopName}, #{shopLogo}, #{managingCharact10}, #{managingCharact9}, #{managingCharact8}, #{managingCharact7}, #{managingCharact6}, #{managingCharact5}, #{managingCharact4}, #{managingCharact3}, #{managingCharact2}, #{managingCharact1}, #{shopFlag30}, #{shopFlag29}, #{shopFlag28}, #{shopFlag27}, #{shopFlag26}, #{shopFlag25}, #{shopFlag24}, #{shopFlag23}, #{shopFlag22}, #{shopFlag21}, #{shopFlag20}, #{shopFlag19}, #{shopFlag18}, #{shopFlag17}, #{shopFlag16}, #{shopFlag15}, #{shopFlag14}, #{shopFlag13}, #{shopFlag12}, #{shopFlag11}, #{shopFlag10}, #{shopFlag9}, #{shopFlag8}, #{shopFlag7}, #{shopFlag6}, #{shopFlag5}, #{shopFlag4}, #{shopFlag3}, #{shopFlag2}, #{shopFlag1}, #{crtTime}, #{crtId},
#{updId}, #{updTime}, #{actId}, #{actTime},
0,
0
)
mapper.update:
UPDATE sl_bs_account SET SL_ACCOUNT = #{slAccount}, SL_TEL = #{slTel}, SL_SHOW_NAME = #{slShowName}, SL_CONTACT = #{slContact}, ACCOUNT_PSD =#{accountPsd}, ACCOUNT_IMG =#{accountImg}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, FROM_FLG = #{fromFlg}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime},
VER = VER+1
WHERE SL_ACCOUNT = #{slAccount}
and (DEL_FLG IS NULL OR DEL_FLG =0)

UPDATE sl_bs_basic_info SET SL_CON_FLG = #{slConFlg}, SNK_FLG = #{snkFlg}, SELF_FLG = #{selfFlg}, AGENT_FLG = #{agentFlg}, OEM_FLG = #{oemFlg}, BUYER_FLG = #{buyerFlg}, SHOP_QUA = #{shopQua}, PROVINCE_CODE = #{provinceCode}, CITY_CODE = #{cityCode}, DISTRICT_CODE = #{districtCode}, MEMO1 = #{memo1}, MEMO2 = #{memo2}, MEMO3 = #{memo3}, MEMO4 = #{memo4}, MEMO5 = #{memo5}, MEMO7 = #{memo7}, MEMO8 = #{memo8}, MEMO9 = #{memo9}, MEMO10 = #{memo10}, MEMO11 = #{memo11}, MEMO12 = #{memo12}, MEMO13 = #{memo13}, MEMO14 = #{memo14}, MEMO15 = #{memo15}, MEMO16 = #{memo16}, MEMO17 = #{memo17}, MEMO18 = #{memo18}, MEMO19 = #{memo19}, MEMO20 = #{memo20},
UPD_ID = #{updId},
UPD_TIME = #{updTime},
VER = VER+1
WHERE SL_CODE = #{slCode}
and (DEL_FLG IS NULL OR DEL_FLG =0)

UPDATE sl_bs_buyershop SET
SL_IDCARD=#{slIdcard},
SL_SORT = #{slSort},
SL_ADDRESS = #{slAddress},
LAT = #{lat},
LON = #{lon},
FLAG10 = #{flag10}, FLAG9 = #{flag9}, FLAG8 = #{flag8}, FLAG7 = #{flag7}, FLAG6 = #{flag6}, FLAG5 = #{flag5}, FLAG4 = #{flag4}, FLAG3 = #{flag3}, FLAG2 = #{flag2}, FLAG1 = #{flag1},
UPD_ID = #{updId},
UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, VER = VER+1 WHERE SL_CODE = #{slCode}
and (DEL_FLG IS NULL OR DEL_FLG =0)

UPDATE sl_bs_shop_info SET SHOP_NAME = #{shopName}, SHOP_LOGO = #{shopLogo}, MANAGING_CHARACT10 = #{managingCharact10}, MANAGING_CHARACT9 = #{managingCharact9}, MANAGING_CHARACT8 = #{managingCharact8}, MANAGING_CHARACT7 = #{managingCharact7}, MANAGING_CHARACT6 = #{managingCharact6}, MANAGING_CHARACT5 = #{managingCharact5}, MANAGING_CHARACT4 = #{managingCharact4}, MANAGING_CHARACT3 = #{managingCharact3}, MANAGING_CHARACT2 = #{managingCharact2}, MANAGING_CHARACT1 = #{managingCharact1}, SHOP_FLAG30 = #{shopFlag30}, SHOP_FLAG29 = #{shopFlag29}, SHOP_FLAG28 = #{shopFlag28}, SHOP_FLAG27 = #{shopFlag27}, SHOP_FLAG26 = #{shopFlag26}, SHOP_FLAG25 = #{shopFlag25}, SHOP_FLAG24 = #{shopFlag24}, SHOP_FLAG23 = #{shopFlag23}, SHOP_FLAG22 = #{shopFlag22}, SHOP_FLAG21 = #{shopFlag21}, SHOP_FLAG20 = #{shopFlag20}, SHOP_FLAG19 = #{shopFlag19}, SHOP_FLAG18 = #{shopFlag18}, SHOP_FLAG17 = #{shopFlag17}, SHOP_FLAG16 = #{shopFlag16}, SHOP_FLAG15 = #{shopFlag15}, SHOP_FLAG14 = #{shopFlag14}, SHOP_FLAG13 = #{shopFlag13}, SHOP_FLAG12 = #{shopFlag12}, SHOP_FLAG11 = #{shopFlag11}, SHOP_FLAG10 = #{shopFlag10}, SHOP_FLAG9 = #{shopFlag9}, SHOP_FLAG8 = #{shopFlag8}, SHOP_FLAG7 = #{shopFlag7}, SHOP_FLAG6 = #{shopFlag6}, SHOP_FLAG5 = #{shopFlag5}, SHOP_FLAG4 = #{shopFlag4}, SHOP_FLAG3 = #{shopFlag3}, SHOP_FLAG2 = #{shopFlag2}, SHOP_FLAG1 = #{shopFlag1},
UPD_ID = #{updId},
UPD_TIME = #{updTime},
VER = VER+1
WHERE SHOP_ID = #{shopId}
and (DEL_FLG IS NULL OR DEL_FLG =0)

UPDATE sl_bs_buyershop SET DEL_FLG = 1, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, UPD_ID = #{crtId},
VER = VER+1
WHERE SL_CODE = #{slCode}
and (DEL_FLG IS NULL OR DEL_FLG =0)

UPDATE sl_bs_account SET DEL_FLG = 1, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, UPD_ID = #{crtId},
VER = VER+1
WHERE SL_ACCOUNT = #{slAccount}
and (DEL_FLG IS NULL OR DEL_FLG =0)

UPDATE sl_bs_basic_info SET DEL_FLG = 1, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, UPD_ID = #{crtId},
VER = VER+1
WHERE SL_CODE = #{slCode}
and (DEL_FLG IS NULL OR DEL_FLG =0)

UPDATE sl_bs_shop_info SET DEL_FLG = 1, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, UPD_ID = #{crtId},
VER = VER+1
WHERE SL_CODE = #{slCode}
and (DEL_FLG IS NULL OR DEL_FLG =0)
mapper.select:
SELECT SL_CODE AS slCode, SHOP_ID AS shopId, SHOP_NAME AS shopName, SHOP_LOGO AS shopLogo FROM sl_bs_shop_info WHERE (DEL_FLG IS NULL OR DEL_FLG =0)
AND SL_CODE = #{filterMap.slCode}
SELECT SL_CODE AS slCode FROM sl_bs_basic_info WHERE SL_ACCOUNT = #{filterMap.slAccount} AND (DEL_FLG IS NULL OR DEL_FLG =0)
SELECT count(1) FROM sl_bs_bankaccount WHERE SL_CODE = #{slCode}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sl_bs_bankaccount ( ACCOUNT_ID, SL_CODE, ACCOUNT_NAME, BANK_NAME, BANK_NO, CARD_TYPE, BANK_TEL, DEL_FLG, CRT_TIME, CRT_ID,
UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME,
VER )VALUES( #{accountId}, #{slCode}, #{accountName}, #{bankName}, #{bankNo}, #{cardType}, #{bankTel},
0,
#{crtTime}, #{crtId},
#{updId}, #{updTime}, #{actId}, #{actTime},
0
)
mapper.update:
UPDATE sl_bs_bankaccount SET
ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName},
BANK_NAME = #{bankName},
BANK_NO = #{bankNo},
CARD_TYPE = #{cardType},
BANK_TEL = #{bankTel},
UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = #{updTime}, VER = VER+1 WHERE SL_CODE = #{slCode}
and (DEL_FLG IS NULL OR DEL_FLG =0)
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM sl_bs_account WHERE sl_account != #{slAccount} AND SL_TEL = #{slTel} AND DEL_FLG = '0'
SELECT COUNT(1) from sl_bs_account where DEL_FLG =0 AND (SL_ACCOUNT = #{slTel} OR SL_TEL =#{slTel} OR SL_SHOW_NAME = #{slTel})
SELECT COUNT(1) from sl_bs_account where DEL_FLG =0 AND (SL_ACCOUNT = #{slShowName} OR SL_TEL =#{slShowName} OR SL_SHOW_NAME = #{slShowName})
SELECT COUNT(1) from sl_bs_account where DEL_FLG =0 AND (SL_ACCOUNT = #{slAccount} OR SL_TEL =#{slAccount} OR SL_SHOW_NAME = #{slAccount})
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sl_house_account WHERE HOUSE_SHOW_NAME != #{slShowName} AND HOUSE_TEL = #{slTel} AND DEL_FLG = '0'
SELECT COUNT(1) from sl_bs_account where DEL_FLG =0 AND SL_ACCOUNT <> #{slAccount} AND (SL_ACCOUNT = #{slAccount} OR SL_TEL =#{slAccount} OR SL_SHOW_NAME = #{slAccount})
SELECT COUNT(1) from sl_bs_account where DEL_FLG =0 AND SL_ACCOUNT <> #{slAccount} AND (SL_ACCOUNT = #{slShowName} OR SL_TEL =#{slShowName} OR SL_SHOW_NAME =#{slShowName})
SELECT COUNT(1) from sl_bs_account where DEL_FLG =0 AND SL_ACCOUNT <> #{slAccount} AND (SL_ACCOUNT = #{slTel} OR SL_TEL =#{slTel} OR SL_SHOW_NAME =#{slTel})
